message.entry: Identifier must be a valid MATLAB message identifier ('component:mnemonic').

entry.note: To be plugged into key: badIdentifier

message.entry: Last method can only accept ''reset'' as an input.
An MException cannot have more than one Correction.

The ''DiagnosticReportStackFrameDecorationCharacter'' feature has been deprecated and no longer functions.
Please discontinue using it immediately.
Stack decoration is currently off by default, but it is planned to be enabled by default soon for R2024b.
If you do not wish to wait until stack decoration is enabled by default, you can use the following command to enable it now:
>> feature(''DiagnosticReportStackDecoration'', 1);
{0}/getStack did not return a valid stack. An empty stack will be used in its place.

entry.note: Immediately follows MATLAB:MException:ErrorIn or MATLAB:legacy_two_part:error_using to make text about MATLAB indexing operations: 'Error using indexing'

message.entry: MESSAGE input must be a character vector or string scalar.
last() method can only be called from command prompt.
Correction must be a scalar matlab.lang.correction.Correction object.
Formatted MESSAGE inputs must be real scalar numeric values, character vectors, or string scalars.

entry.note: Will be followed by a function name and line number in which there had been an error
Will be followed by a function name and line number which had been interrupted with Ctrl-C
Will be followed by a function name and line number which had been interrupted with Ctrl-C

message.entry: Stack frame decoration must be zero or one characters.
